code: var config={url:"https://norma.nomoreparties.space/api/ingredients",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};var checkResponse=function checkResponse(res){if(res.ok){return res.json();}return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));};var getDataIngredients=function getDataIngredients(){return fetch("".concat(config.url),{method:"GET",headers:config.headers}).then(checkResponse).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};export{getDataIngredients};
